item.title: PLUG
item.description: score:-14 Chances: Plug Power Announces Settlement with SEC 3 Best Green Hydrogen Stocks to Buy in August 2023 Plug Power Hosts Analyst Day, Showcasing the World’s First 15TPD Green Hydrogen Plant Plug Power Sales Beat Expectations, the Stock Is Tanking.
